title: Tech News: Meta Is Going to Court Again
itunes:title: Tech News: Meta Is Going to Court Again
description:
Mark Zuckerberg is going to have to appear in a federal court to answer questions about his alleged involvement in the Cambridge Analytica scandal. Meanwhile, an art installation company is also suing Meta for being a copycat. Plus lots more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Meta, Mark Zuckerberg, Sheryl Sandberg, Cambridge Analytica, Meta.is, trademark, digital rights, UK, surveillance, end to end encryption, client side scanning, electric vehicles, EVs, Ford, Tesla, bitcoin, cryptocurrency, Elon Musk
